description: It is not uncommon for people to think of the command line as an ancient, impenetrable and impossible interface to get any real work done. Even if you are a veteran vim user, the thought of actually creating anything other than a single line, argument based interface will probably seem like something out of reach for almost anyone. Not so! Using nothing but JavaScript, you can create rich, compelling, command line interfaces that leverage keyboard and mouse input, and more!
title: BUILDING GRAPHICAL COMMAND LINE APPLICATIONS IN JAVASCRIPT
